product_name: Mountain House Scrambled Eggs with Bacon - 20 oz. Can
long_description: Make a delicious breakfast on the trail with this can of Mountain House Scrambled Eggs with Bacon. Freeze-dried, precooked scrambled eggs are mixed with flavorful bacon. Easy to prepare-just add hot water. Can contains 16 servings. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Make a delicious breakfast on the trail with this can of Mountain House Scrambled Eggs with Bacon.
